collections.description: These resources were listed in [Sharing biological data: why, when, and how](https://doi.org/10.1002/1873-3468.14067), which prompted further novel curation of the Bioregistry which included the addition of GenBank, Panorama Public, EMPIAR, and SSBD. It also prompted the curation of mappings to FAIRSharing when possible.
collections.name: Resources mentioned in "Sharing biological data: why, when, and how"

collections.description: Resources used in the semantic web, inspired by [this list](https://github.com/prefixcommons/biocontext/blob/master/registry/semweb_context.yaml) in BioContext.
collections.name: Semantic Web Context

collections.description: The data sources used in xrefs in the ChEBI ontology. More information in the "Data Sources" section of [this document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/13_FqP_8qkDdw5RFv5qMYo7xRyfY4xUiuVtLn845A6Io/edit#heading=h.dkfn7xf53tpx).
collections.name: ChEBI Data Sources

collections.description: This collection contains the many prefixes for the different repackaging of the International Classification of Diseases (ICD) throughout its major revisions.
collections.name: International Classifications of Diseases

collections.description: This collection contains various brain atlases from the Allen Institute.
collections.name: Allen Institute Ontologies
